Source.Name: libbytesize
Source.Summary: A tiny library providing a C "class" for working with arbitrary big sizes in bytes
Source.Description: The libbytesize is a C library that facilitates work with sizes in bytes. Be it parsing the input from users or producing a nice human readable representation of a size in bytes this library takes localization into account. It also provides support for sizes bigger than MAXUINT64.
